item.title: DUCT LEAK Detection Systems – Duct Leak Detectors

remarks.para: One detector in each detector zone may be inoperative.

note.para: The Duct Leak Detection Systems contain two loops (A and B) with seven zones in each loop.

placard.para: Placard near respective DUCT LEAK Light "ONE DET LOOP INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: Reference DMP 26-18-1-2 (PROCEDURE 2) to isolate if only one loop is setting msg. Only one loop (A or B) in a zone can be deferred.
